content: into the next st *half_double_crochet into the next st work 2hdc into the next st repeat from * around join 24sts rnds 4+ ch1 half_double_crochet into each st around join 24sts repeat round 4 until the cap fits on dolls head as pictured i worked a total of 6 rounds but it may be more or less for you depending upon yarn choice hook size and personal gauge fasten_off leaving a long tail to shape the parting and sew the cap onto the dolls head to make the parting… attach a darning needle to your finishing tail and weave in and out of 3 rounds up the join on your cap pull tightly to gather then wrap the yarn around the gather several times until you are happy with how it looks click here to watch a video on the weebee and friends youtube channel demonstrating how this is done do not fasten_off the tail… to sew the cap onto the head… continue to use the finishing tail to sew the hair cap to head using a whip st please see this video on the weebee and friends youtube channel if you need help with this hide loose ends ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ finishing touches… pigtails you can find pigtails for your doll in this free pattern here colour those cheeks to add colour to your dolls cheeks you can use ordinary makeup blush and a blusher brush sweep it beneath the eye at an angle up towards the hair line ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ playsuit playsuit is worked from the neck down initially in row and then in joined rounds row 1 ch22 half_double_crochet into second chain from the hook *work 2hdc into the next chain half_double_crochet into the next chain repeat from * across turn 31sts row 2 ch1 not a st from now on single_crochet into each of the first 4sts ch2 skip the next 7sts single_crochet into each of the next 9sts ch2 skip the next 7sts single_crochet into each of the remaining 4sts turn 17sts & two ch2 arm holes round 3 ch1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 4sts work 4hdc into the next chain space half_double_crochet into each of the next 9sts work 4hdc into the next chain space half_double_crochet into each of the remaining 4sts join the last st to the first with a slip_stitch 25sts now is the best time to test the fit of your suit if it s too tight try reworking the last 3 rounds with a bigger hook if it s took big try reworking them with a smaller hook round 4 ch1 half_double_crochet into each of the first 4sts work 2hdc into the next st *half_double_crochet into each of the next 4sts work 2hdc into the next st repeat from * around join 30sts round 5 ch1 half_double_crochet into each of the first 5sts work 2hdc into the next st *half_double_crochet into each of the next 5sts work 2hdc into the next st repeat from * around join 35sts round 6 ch1
